intro.content:
Hi friends, how is everything going?

Here, we are now entering the 40th week of the pregnancy and we cannot wait to say hi to the baby.
Current status? this.

Let's roll!

hero.description: My dog would really prefer it if I turned myself into a dog bed. Since I'm not too keen on that project, I built her a chair instead.
hero.title: A chair made for needy pets
hero.why:
I actually discovered the work of Simone Grietz a while back when she made this super cute dog selfie booth. But OMG, her last video is absolutely fantastic!
Her dog, Scraps, looks so much like Lilo (yup same neediness üôÑ), our little coton de Tulear and I loved to see the different steps it took to design this custom chair!
